item.title: Fiancée: Lifeboat Partnership & Domestic Stability
item.description:
Fiancée: Lifeboat Partnership & Domestic Stability

Summary: Vector dynamic: provides domestic stability and effort; functions as lifeboat partnership. Support can be silent, not strategic advising.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batches 1–4, 6

Context

Together since 10 May 2019. Six years. She knows everything.

Function

  • Domestic stability partner
  • Co-conspirator on practical projects
  • Provides support through presence, not necessarily strategic advising
  • Sings when happy

Third Layer Connection

Boxing together (starting Jan 4). She found it — she always wanted to learn something like this. Complete beginners together.

item.title: Anchor Decision: PostNL as Fortress Base
item.description:
Anchor Decision: PostNL as Fortress Base

Summary: Chose PostNL mail-sorting job as low-cognitive-overhead anchor to create psychic and financial space for the rebuild.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batch 6

Context

After being unemployed since September (lost job with working agency, pneumonia from freezer work, Tempo-Team abandonment), found this part-time job online. Two rounds of video interviews. Started November 25, 2025.

Function

Fortress Base: low complexity, high stability. Funds the rebuild. Reduces volatility. Creates space for sovereign construction.

item.title: Fortress Base: Low-Complexity Stability
item.description:
Fortress Base: Low-Complexity Stability

Summary: Build a ‘Fortress Base’ job (low complexity, high stability) that funds the rebuild and reduces volatility.

Source: Raw Transcripts: Batches 4–6

Principle

A Fortress Base provides low-cognitive-overhead anchor employment. It creates psychic and financial space for sovereign construction.

Current Implementation

PostNL mail sorting — started November 25, 2025.

Function

Not the destination. The platform from which to build.
